 ∙ Arrangement for referral transport: Delay in reaching a health care facility is one of the major ‘delays’ 
responsible for maternal mortality. It is, therefore, necessary to ensure the following:
 - If the woman has decided to deliver at a health facility, provide her the contact details of 108 and other 
government referral transport available to ensure that a vehicle is available to transport her to the health 
facility whenever required.
